alert.note: Alert for Coffee (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 9:03PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Coffee County through 930 PM CDT... At 903 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Elba, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elba, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, New Brockton, Lee, Pine Level, Mixons Crossroads, Carl Folsom A/p, Lowry Mill, Camp Humming Hills, Clintonville, Wise Mill, Roeton, Camp Alaflo Bsa, Clowers Crossroads, Arcus, Woodland Grove Church, Jack, Java and Chestnut Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
